page.title: 17School Trips
page.content: On 28th June the juniors went to the Farne Islands. While we were on the boat it started to rain. We saw prffins, razorbills, shags and lots more. When we got back in the bus we went ot the shops after our dinners. The infants went to Stewart Park on 21st June. It was raining when we set off. We went to see the animals. There was a peacock. It spread its feathers out. Next we went to the plant house and saw all the different plants, then we went back for out picnic. After that we played football. We went ot the shop and bought something. We all went upstairs and got an ice-cream. On the 7th, 8th, 9th June 8 boys went to London. They stayed at the Norfolk Towers Hotel and went ot Wembley to see the schoolboy International. We went to London Zoo and Greenwich Park.
